feed.title: PAPER: New algorithm for the discrete logarithm problem on elliptic curves

entry.title: PAPER: New algorithm for the discrete logarithm problem on elliptic curves
entry.summary: The provided context is a single line message from someone named 'jp'. It includes a link to a PDF document hosted on the International Association for Cryptologic Research (IACR) ePrint archive. The document was published in 2015 and has the file name '310.pdf'. No other information or context is given. Upon clicking the link, the PDF document opens and appears to be a research paper titled "Efficient Zero-Knowledge Contingent Payments in Cryptocurrencies with Applications to Bitcoin". The paper describes a method for creating efficient zero-knowledge contingent payments using cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. The authors explain how their method can be used to create smart contracts that only execute under certain conditions, without revealing any additional information about the parties involved. Overall, the context message is brief and lacking in detail, but the linked paper provides a fascinating look into the world of cryptocurrency and the potential uses of smart contracts.
